videos.description: 1H (14:56) DUKE Grayson Allen made Layup. Assisted by Luke Kennard.
videos.headline: Duke gets the steal and gets the layup

videos.description: Grayson Allen runs up the court with a head of speed, gets the ball and then flies to the hoop throwing down a ridiculous dunk for the Duke.
videos.headline: Grayson Allen nearly destroys the rim with monstrous dunk
L. Kennard gets the steal and slams home the dunk

videos.description: No one boxes out Frank Jackson and he makes UNLV pay by flying in slamming down the putback with the two hand dunk.
videos.headline: Jackson rocks the rim with huge putback dunk for Duke

videos.description: Duke takes off on the fast break with Luke Kennard throwing the behind the back pass to Jayson Tatum for the huge dunk to keep the Blue Devils rolling.
videos.headline: Behind the back pass leads to another Duke slam
G. Allen with the huge put back dunk

videos.description: 2H (3:27) DUKE Javin DeLaurier made Dunk. Assisted by Matt Jones.
videos.headline: J. DeLaurier made Dunk. Assisted by M. Jones.

videos.description: Breaking down Duke's 94-45 victory over UNLV
videos.headline: Breaking down Duke's 94-45 victory over UNLV

videos.description: Grayson Allen scores a career-high 34 points to lead No. 5 Duke to an easy 94-45 victory over UNLV.
videos.headline: Duke wins easily over UNLV
